item.title: Killer-Queen CTF: Broke College Students
item.description: Broke College Students Basic idea: Format string attack in two steps. Step 1: leak an address, find the same offset with objdump, add offset of MONEY – result is real address of MONEY in memory, which we want to override. Step 2: Use format string to write 999999 characters followed by %n, allowing us to place that value in an address we specify afterwards – so we specify the MONEY address to get that amount of money.
